PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (CAPITAL COST ALLOWANCE -- INTRODUCTION OF CLASSES 43.2, 47, 48 AND 49) by making provision for the accelerated write-off of hydrocarbon transmission pipelines and related pumping and compression equipment and for combustion turbines.
